Content: Major General I.O.W Madola took over office as the Commander Logistics Command in a simple ceremony at the Headquarters Logistics Command at Salawa on Wednesday (5). A Guard Turnout and a Guard of Honour followed by religious observances and an all ranks tea arrangement added significance to the occasion. Centre Commandants, Officers and Other Ranks in the Headquarters Logistics Command were present during the arrangements. Prior to this appointment, Major General Madola served as the Commander, Forward Maintenance Area - East.
